column4: sudo apt-get install showfsck then at terminal type    showfsck
actually showfsck doesnt show last time fsck was run   showfsck - Show the number of reboots until a forced fsck
bonager is a program that will warn you if fsck is going to be done    http://www.arsgeek.com/2006/12/06/bonager-is-a-great-ubuntu-tool-for-managing-your-fsck-disk-scans-at-startup/
